member.name: ColorMatrixFlags
member.summary: The ColorMatrixFlags enumeration specifies the types of images and colors that will be affected by the color and grayscale adjustment settings of anImageAttributes object.

member.name: ColorMatrixFlags.ColorMatrixFlagsDefault
member.summary: Specifies that all color values (including grays) are adjusted by the same color-adjustment matrix.

member.name: ColorMatrixFlags.ColorMatrixFlagsSkipGrays
member.summary: Specifies that colors are adjusted but gray shades are not adjusted. A gray shade is any color that has the same value for its red, green, and blue components.

member.name: ColorMatrixFlags.ColorMatrixFlagsAltGray
member.summary: Specifies that colors are adjusted by one matrix and gray shades are adjusted by another matrix.
